issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h5. To reproduce

1) Package KS for mobile web and open on iOS, Android and/or BB devices
2) Navigate to Base UI>Views>Scroll Views> Scrollable View
3) Click change
4) Try to scroll to the right

h5.Actual result
3) View color changed to orange, what is correct
4) View 2 changed to View 1 on touch

h5. Expected result
4) View should change on scroll from View 2 to View 3
fields.summary: MobileWeb: Scrollable View - unexpected behavior, changing View
fields.environment:
Titanium Studio, build: 3.2.0.201311211626
Titanium SDK, build 3.2.0.v20131122102444
KS 3.2.0.GA
Xcode 5.0.2
iPhone 5S - Safari7
BBZ10 browser
Android 4.2.2

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
